Text:
wow! u r really after the animated movies. that makes u my favourite. i m gonna replace all ma old prints with the ones u upload.
thanx bro.
lol, well the rest of the team is doing live action films, so i figured i would do some animated films.
well, thats a good decision :D, keep 'em coming.
sweet, what about the classic Disney ones? any plans on doing those?

@ hewillseethebigboard, yes i have done a few 
Sleeping Beauty ( 16:9 widescreen and also 1080p)
Pinocchio ( is 4:3 aspect ratio on the blu ray i have no idea why)
Snow White ( also 4:3 aspect ratio )

Keep in mind that the were all ripped of a blu ray but 2 of those movies have been made 4:3

oh i didnt know that you did those 3, that's cool and yes i know that two of them are in a 4:3 aspect ratio but i prefer that rather then having them cropped (see dbz remastered).
and talking about anime, what about them, will you do any of them or are u not into anime. cus if u are, samurai champloo the complete series came out on blu-ray and apparently it's amazing. 
good day to you sir.

every blu ray I download from the PS3-team I am able to play it on my PS3 but I can't Fastforward or rewind. 

Am I doing something wrong or is this a known problem? How do I fix it?

I would really appreciate any help.. thanks
@ Jrrr. Ive had no problem with that. You should be able to use the left and right D-pad arrows to ff or rw not the other buttons.
Please correct me if I am wrong, this WILL play on a stand alone dvd player..or not?
is the newest one??? the on in theaters???
